projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: My Portfolio Website is written in Typescript, Next.js and TailwindCSS, while using Vercel to host the website.

projects.name: Photography Portfolio
projects.description: My Portfolio Website for showing off my photography is written in Typescript, Next.js and Tailwindcss. The Website as well as backend are hosted on Vercel, whilst the data is store in a MongoDB Atlas Database. The Pictures are prepared for being served with an AWS Lambda Function, and then stored in an AWS S3 Bucket.
